data.title: UA Hope-Texarkana New Student Orientation Events Scheduled
data.meta_description: Get ready for a groovy time as the lava lamps come on and get those bell bottoms out because New Student Orientation at the University of Arkansas Hope-Texarkana is almost here.
data.text:
Get ready for a groovy time as the lava lamps come on and get those bell bottoms out because New Student Orientation at the University of Arkansas Hope-Texarkana is almost here.

This year's groovy theme will help new UAHT students feel at peace and get into the groove of their first semester.

New Student Orientation helps new, first-time UAHT students prepare for college by going over academic expectations, financial aid, and student account information.

During orientation, students can get their student ID card, pick up their UAHT parking sticker, and learn about important resources to help them do well in college. They will also have the chance to familiarize themselves with the campuses.

The fall semester may seem still a long time away, but it will be here before you know it. There are four New Student Orientation options to take advantage of at UAHT. Make plans to attend one of these Orientation sessions.

Hope Campus New Student Orientation Options

Evening Morning

Monday, August 12 from 5:30 PM to 8:30 PM. & Tuesday, August 13 from 9 AM to 12 PM.

Texarkana Campus New Student Orientation Options:

Evening Morning

Wednesday, August 14 • 5:30 – 8:30 p.m. & Thursday, August 15 • 9:00 a.m. – 12:00 p.m.

If you are a new student to UAHT this fall it is encouraged to participate at one of the New Student Orientations. Students can register for orientation by submitting the registration form using the link below.

Register for New Student Orientation Here.

For more information or to register for New Student Orientation via phone, contact the UAHT Enrollment Office at 870-722-8174 or email admissions@uaht.edu.

Fall registration is open until Friday, August 23. Classes will begin on Wednesday, August 21. To apply, visit uaht.edu/admissions/apply-now
